logger.doc:name: startRequest - DEBUG
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "message":"request to: " ++ p('api.users.host') ++ p('api.users.path'), "flow": flow.name, "correlationId": vars.correlationId }]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable:
%dw 2.0 output application/json
var errorCode = error.errorType.identifier
var httpStatus = errorCode match{ case "CONNECTIVITY" -> 502 case "TIMEOUT" -> 504 else -> 500 } --- httpStatus default attributes.statusCode

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "message": if(vars.httpStatus == 504) "TIMEOUT EXCEEDED" else if(vars.httpStatus == 502) "CONNECTIVITY ERROR" else "INTERNAL SERVER ERROR", "error": error.description }

logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "message": "An error has occurred", "flowName": flow.name, "error": error.description }]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable:
%dw 2.0 output application/json
var errorCode = error.errorType.identifier
var httpStatus = errorCode match{ case "BAD_REQUEST" -> 400 case "UNAUTHORIZED" -> 401 case "FORBIDDEN" -> 403 case "NOT_FOUND" -> 404 case "METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED" -> 405 case "UNSUPPORTED_MEDIA_TYPE" -> 415 case "BAD_GATEWAY" -> 502 case "SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE" -> 503 case "TIMEOUT" -> 504 case "CONNECTIVITY" -> 504 else -> 500 } --- httpStatus default attributes.statusCode

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 output application/json
var errorMessage = vars.httpStatus match{ case 401 -> "UNAUTHORIZED" case 403 -> "FORBIDDEN" case 405 -> "METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED" case 415 -> "UNSUPPORTED_MEDIA_TYPE" case 502 -> "BAD_GATEWAY" case 503 -> "SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE" else -> 500 } --- { "message": errorMessage, "error": error.description }

logger.doc:name: endRequest - DEBUG
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "message":"request to: " ++ p('api.users.host') ++ p('api.users.path'), "flow": flow.name, "correlationId": vars.correlationId }]

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 output application/json
var filteredUsers = if (vars.userId != null) vars.users filter ((user) -> user.userId == vars.userId) else vars.users
--- filteredUsers map ((user) -> { userId: user.userId, name: user.name, lastName: user.lastName, email: user.email, phoneNumber: user.phoneNumber, address: ( payload filter ((item) -> item.id == user.userId) map ((address) -> address.address) )[0] default "Address not found." })

logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "message": "An error has occurred", "flowName": flow.name, "error": error.description }]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "message": "An error has occurred", "error": if(vars.httpStatus == 400) "Bad Request" else if(vars.httpStatus == 404) "Not Found" else "Internal server error", "httpStatus": vars.httpStatus }
